paper_abstract: In this paper, we focus on investigating the properties of sequences of fuzzy-valued Choquet (for short, (C)-) integrable functions. Firstly, the concept of uniform (C)-integrabiliy and other new concepts like uniform absolute continuity and uniform boundedness for sequences of fuzzy-valued (C)-integrable functions are introduced and then the relations among them are discussed. As the applications of these concepts, we also present several convergence theorems for sequences of fuzzy-valued (C)-integrable functions by using uniform (C)-integrability.
paper_title: On the properties of sequences of fuzzy-valued Choquet integrable functions
